node.title: Fishing Report: Shasta Lake, Trinity Lake, Whiskey Town Lake
node.excerpt: Lake Shasta Lake Shasta has had its highs and lows,fishing has been ok with big rainbows far and few between. But there is light at the end of the tunnel as we enter our summer the water temperature will stratify pushing the shad in to the main body of the lake.
